body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/fLNwNU5M5CU3PuQLRSHsNsG710X6A2PkbWC7QkjxwWbq28wwlh9KtAADBbRMDiSPJ7XdDFRIkrlr0Wj*CrQ2hjjMX4zOwmk2/aaaa.png)hi i have a problem how can i fix this error?

replies.body:
Hi Aleme. Are you trying to create an energy model for this shape? This model is not a model that you want to split between perimeter and core zones. Check Introduction to EnergyPlus document to read more about thermal zones and zoning.

Mostapha

Hi Mostapha

tnx for your attention,acctually i have only one zone under this dome,i dont know how to describe its windows to honeybee to analyse heating and cooling energy use for my building,when i connect it to hb glazing ratio it just get confused and doesnt recognize my dome az only a roof,whats your suggestion about this problem

Have you watched [Chris's videos](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m8ncENwXpek&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_) on how to put an energy model together with Honeybee? Preparing an energy model for your shape as a single zone is quite straight forward.

[](https://i.imgflip.com/ycc6p.jpg) Hi Alemeh, Mostapha is right, you need to simplify it a bit. I'm watching the tutorials and recommend to check them out, they help a lot. Specifically about your problem: [one](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TpqzxnuwhAs&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_&index=13), [two](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Md6LFS6cwc0&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_&index=14) and [three](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aEC62LY094A&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_&index=15).
